name: Divisions & Integration of Surgery
content: This is purely an online event .The Surgery 2018 conference majorly focus on surgery related to all parts like General Surgery, Cardiac Surgery, Neurosurgery, Orthopedic Surgery, ENT Surgery, Plastic surgery, Microsurgery, Colorectal Surgery, Transplant Surgery, Vein Surgery, Bariatric Surgery, Urology Surgery, Oncology Surgery, Laparoscopic Surgery, Gynecology Surgery, Eye Surgery, Laser surgery, Hand Surgery, Craniofacial surgery, Vascular Surgery, Outpatient Surgery, Pediatric Surgery, Robotic Surgery, Nursing Surgery, Trauma surgery, Cosmetic Surgery, Reconstructive surgery, Plastic surgery, Transplantation, Laparotomy Surgery, and Orthopedic Surgery. This conference will craft a platform for all the Doctors, researchers, scientists, students by bringing together worldâ€™s Surgeons, Anesthesiologists, Medical Professionals, Residents, Fellowship holders, Medical Students, Nurses, Surgical tool technicians, Pharmaceutical Industries, Healthcare Industries.
